nodes.long_description:
👻 Play as a Ghost – **Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!**

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

👻 Become the Ultimate Ghost – Walk through walls, float, and move objects just by thinking about it!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice – Whisper, laugh, or scream into your mic and watch him panic!

🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground – No rules, no limits! Roam freely through a giant haunted house, uncovering hidden rooms, mysterious objects, and eerie surprises. Experiment with your powers and create your own ghostly mischief!

🎯 Complete Fun Missions & Solve Puzzles – Trick NPCs, uncover paranormal secrets, and test your ghostly skills through spooky challenges!

⚡ Super Interactive Gameplay – Open doors, knock over furniture, flicker lights—cause total chaos and see how NPCs react!

😂 Prank or Scare? It’s Up to You! – Be a sneaky trickster or a full-on horror legend. You make the rules!

🔥 Mess Around, Have Fun, and Show Off Your Skills! – Play your way, discover cool tricks, and see what crazy things you can do as a ghost!

💀 Are you ready to be the scariest (or funniest) ghost ever? 

Jump in and start haunting NOW!
nodes.short_description:
👻 Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice
🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground
🎯 Complete Fun Missions

nodes.change_log:
Version 0.9.7.7

Week #3 Update:  Punch Time 🥊

In this update, the ghost slips on a pair of boxing gloves and steps into the ring with grandpa himself!

Introducing the brand-new mini-game: Boxing with Grandpa 🧓💥

Duck, dodge, and deliver the spookiest punches in a hilarious 1v1 brawl.

Can you go the full 12 rounds... or will grandpa land the knockout punch? 🥴

Step into the haunted ring and decide who’s the real champ of the house!

🥊 Boxing Gloves Added – Equip your ghost with cartoon-style gloves and challenge grandpa to a duel.
🎮 Improved Hit Detection – Every punch counts!

Also in this update:

- Expanded entry to the ghost’s room
- Sound improvements
- General improvements to grandpa’s movement animations
- Smooth transition added when restarting the game after the ghost dies
- Bug fixes & polish

Got a wild idea for what the ghost should do next?
We’re building the game with you — email us at info@dream-dev.com

New mischief drops next week — stay punchy and spooky! 👻

🎮 Link to the game:

https://vr.meta.me/s/2eRQMxytRLAtg8k

---
Version 0.9.7.4

Week #2 Update: Toy Arsenal 💥

Ready to turn the house into a chaotic playground? The ghost just found a box of ridiculous toy weapons — and grandpa’s in big trouble!

This update brings four brand new tools of mischievous destruction:

🔍 Grow & Shrink Ray – Make anything huge... or teeny-tiny. Yes, even grandpa.
🪠 Mega Plunger Launcher – Sticks to stuff. Mostly grandpa.
🌊 Water Bazooka – Soak everything (and everyone) in your path!
⚡ Shock-o-Matic – Give grandpa a zappy surprise with this hand-powered electric toy!

Also in this update:

* Easter theme added — find 5 hidden eggs! 🐣
* New Movement Speed Option – Choose how fast you fly! Go full turbo or take it slow.
* Improved Grab System – Smoother and snappier object grabbing.
* Bug Fixes & Polish – As always, we’re squashing bugs to keep your haunt smooth.

Got wild ideas? We’re building the game with you — send us your craziest thoughts!

Discord: https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW
Email: info@dream-dev.com

More ghostly fun drops next week — stay spooky! 👻

🎮 Link to the game: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

----
Version 0.9.7.1:

Starting this week, You Are Ghost will receive weekly themed updates — fresh content every single week!

🎯 Week #1 Update: Sports Mayhem

Join the ghost and grandpa for some wild, spooky sports action. Smash records and become the next ghost champion!

Now available to play:

🏀 Basketball 🏈 American Football ⛳ Golf 🎯 Darts

Also in this update:

- Added localization for 3 new languages: Spanish, German, and French
- New option to change the look of the voice wave
- Improved button interactions
- New hit reaction sounds
- Removed the drying machine (to avoid confusion with the washing machine)
- General bug fixes

Got ideas for future updates or ways we can make You Are Ghost even better?

We’d love to hear from you!

Join the conversation on our Discord channel https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW or email us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thanks for playing — you're the real haunt hero! 👻

Stay tuned — the theme for next week’s update will be revealed very soon!

---
First Version:

Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where your own voice is your ultimate tool for terror! Whisper, laugh, or scream into your microphone to frighten an old grandpa and mess with the living in hilarious ways. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and uncover the haunted house’s hidden secrets.

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

Version 0.9.7.6

Week #4 Update: Spooky Pals 🕷🐍

The haunted house just got creepier — and way more fun!
This week, the ghost made two new terrifying friends: a spider and a snake 🕷🐍
They might be cute (well, kind of), but grandpa’s absolutely terrified! 😱

Sneak, scare, and unleash your spooky side with your new partners in paranormal mischief!

🕷 Interact with your new animal pals — toss, hide, and surprise!
👴 Watch grandpa freak out in all-new hilarious ways!

Also in this update:

More polish and minor fixes

Preparations for next week's surprise 👀

Got spooky suggestions?

Drop us a line at info@dream-dev.com

Stay creepy — and don’t forget to check for snakes under the bed! 👻

🎮 Link to the game:

https://vr.meta.me/s/2eRQMxytRLAtg8k

----
